mapper.select:
/* selectInfraDailyServiceMain */
SELECT INFRA_SERVICE_ID AS infraServiceId ,INFRA_MAIN_ID AS infraMainId ,INFRA_BACKUP_CHK AS infraBackUpServiceChk ,INFRA_BACKUP_BIGO AS infraBackUpServiceBigo ,INFRA_SPAM_CHK AS infraSpamServiceChk ,INFRA_SPAM_BIGO AS infraSpamServiceBigo ,INFRA_MAIL_CHK AS infraMailServiceChk ,INFRA_MAIL_BIGO AS infraMailServiceBigo ,INFRA_DNS_CHK AS infraDNSServiceChk ,INFRA_DNS_BIGO AS infraDNSServiceBigo FROM INFRA_DAILY_SERVICE WHERE INFRA_MAIN_ID = #{infraMainId}

SELECT INFRA_ETC_ID AS infraEtcId ,INFRA_MAIN_ID AS infraMainId ,VPN1_CLUST_CHK AS vpn1ClustChk ,VPN1_CLUST_BIGO AS vpn1ClustBigo ,VPN1_EVENT_CHK AS vpn1EventChk ,VPN1_EVENT_BIGO AS vpn1EventBigo ,VPN2_CLUST_CHK AS vpn2ClustChk ,VPN2_CLUST_BIGO AS vpn2ClustBigo ,VPN2_EVENT_CHK AS vpn2EventChk ,VPN2_EVENT_BIGO AS vpn2EventBigo ,SSO1_CLUST_CHK AS sso1ClustChk ,SSO1_CLUST_BIGO AS sso1ClustBigo ,SSO1_EVENT_CHK AS sso1EventChk ,SSO1_EVENT_BIGO AS sso1EventBigo ,SSO2_CLUST_CHK AS sso2ClustChk ,SSO2_CLUST_BIGO AS sso2ClustBigo ,SSO2_EVENT_CHK AS sso2EventChk ,SSO2_EVENT_BIGO AS sso2EventBigo ,DDOS1_CLUST_CHK AS ddos1ClustChk ,DDOS1_CLUST_BIGO AS ddos1ClustBigo ,DDOS1_EVENT_CHK AS ddos1EventChk ,DDOS1_EVENT_BIGO AS ddos1EventBigo ,DDOS2_CLUST_CHK AS ddos2ClustChk ,DDOS2_CLUST_BIGO AS ddos2ClustBigo ,DDOS2_EVENT_CHK AS ddos2EventChk ,DDOS2_EVENT_BIGO AS ddos2EventBigo ,FW1_CLUST_CHK AS fw1ClustChk ,FW1_CLUST_BIGO AS fw1ClustBigo ,FW1_EVENT_CHK AS fw1EventChk ,FW1_EVENT_BIGO AS fw1EventBigo ,FW2_CLUST_CHK AS fw2ClustChk ,FW2_CLUST_BIGO AS fw2ClustBigo ,FW2_EVENT_CHK AS fw2EventChk ,FW2_EVENT_BIGO AS fw2EventBigo ,SPAM1_CLUST_CHK AS spam1ClustChk ,SPAM1_CLUST_BIGO AS spam1ClustBigo ,SPAM1_EVENT_CHK AS spam1EventChk ,SPAM1_EVENT_BIGO AS spam1EventBigo ,SPAM2_CLUST_CHK AS spam2ClustChk ,SPAM2_CLUST_BIGO AS spam2ClustBigo ,SPAM2_EVENT_CHK AS spam2EventChk ,SPAM2_EVENT_BIGO AS spam2EventBigo ,GMONITOR_CLUST_CHK AS gMonitorClustChk ,GMONITOR_CLUST_BIGO AS gMonitorClustBigo ,GMONITOR_EVENT_CHK AS gMonitorEventChk ,GMONITOR_EVENT_BIGO AS gMonitorEventBigo ,EMONITOR_CLUST_CHK AS eMonitorClustChk ,EMONITOR_CLUST_BIGO AS eMonitorClustBigo ,EMONITOR_EVENT_CHK AS eMonitorEventChk ,EMONITOR_EVENT_BIGO AS eMonitorEventBigo
WHERE INFRA_MAIN_ID = #{infraMainId}
